page.title: 06F of D Christchurch Campsite
page.content: {200,000 camper nights are taken up each year for the Forest of Dean.This campsite has facilities for camping and caravans.It is run by the Forestry Commission.There is a shop on site,an imformation centre and {toilets.People come here for the {forest,peace and quiet,nature {trails,bird watching and fishing.There is a garage and shop in 10 minutes walk.A newsagent,small super markets and a post office can be reached in fifteen minutes.Nearby is the{River {Wye,Symonds Yat,a maze and bird {garden.}A short car drive takes you into the{Wye Valley with scenic {views.Hotels and guest houses are avalible in the area.The Forest of Dean District Council is encouraging Tourism in the area by publicising the Forest.
